resources.string: Take the phone and try to make your partner guess the mystery word only by using one clue at a time !

Correct proposition : + 1 point
Word not found : - 5 points

"
Rules

4 rounds
2 players
4 words per game
" "1 word per round

" "A player makes his partner guess the mystery word with one clue at a time.

" "The clue must not have the same base 
" "Example of a forbidden clue : 
Mystery word : Camion 
Clue : Camionette 

" "Correct proposition : +1 point
" "Word not found : -5 points

" "The game starts with a score of 10 points."

"
Lexify, the mobile game that LEXIFY your vocabulary.

" "Inspired from tv show Mot de Passe on the french channel France 2, " "Lexify's goal is either to guess or make guess a mystery word." "

Mail : lexifyapp@gmail.com

" "Authors: 

 KHATIR Nassim
NAYET Lucas
PIOT Nicolas 
ABDULWAHAB Hani"

"Rules of the game against the computer: guess a word.

" "4 rounds
4 words suggested to guess by turn.

" "For each round, the computer selects a word and 4 synonyms.
" "These are randomly selected.
" "The user must guess the word from the proposed synonyms.

" "Playable mode with or without timer adjustable in options.

"
Your turn, make your partner guess this word !
It\'s Finished ! You made a total score of :
"You lost ! The word to guess was "
